inn1.comm: pitched up outside the off stump, driven past the cover fielder
short of a good length delivery, defended on the front-foot
short of a good length delivery, gets a good stride in and defends it down
comes down the track and looks to hammer it away on the leg side but fails to make contact, ball rolls away off the pad

first blood! short of a good length delivery, came in with the angle, Masakadza looks to go over the top of mid-on but fails to get enough bat on it and the ball lobs up straight to Ashraful at mid-on. Nazmul strikes in the first over
hit on the pad, appeal turned down
turned away behind square on the leg side
quicker delivery outside the off stump, looks to defend but fails to make contact, did not miss the off stump by much

gone! tossed up close to the off stump line, Taylor pushes forward and drives at it and the ball goes straight back to the bowler who makes no mistake. Zimbabwe two down in two overs. Excellent start for Bangladesh
hit on the pad
off the pad and the ball rolls away behind square on the leg side
driven down to third man for a single
good length delivery outside the off stump, defended
short of a good length delivery, Coventry gets forward and defends it straight back down the track

another one bites the dust! short of a good length delivery and this one shaped away a touch, Coventry stays back and has a prod at it, ball clips the outside edge and goes straight to the keeper. Zimbabwe three down and in deep deep trouble here
beaten the bat again, the batsman was fishing for it outside off after making room, nearly gets an outside edge
moves across the lone and looks to defend, misses the ball again
watchfully defended off the front foot back to the bowler
slices it just past the fielder at gully, Mahmudullah runs back and dives but he just can't hang on to it
whoah, that one kept low, batsman looks to crash that through point but is beaten
on offstump, gets forward and blocks it down the track
on middle and leg this time, defended to the leg side this time
back of a length well outside off, waits on the backfoot and steers it behind backward point
fuller this time, just outside off, defended towards short cover
fullish ball, blocked back to the bowler
these Zimbabweans are having plenty of trouble against Razzaq, this one hardly turned outside off, the batsman just plays down the wrong line, and gets an edge to the keeper, which Mushfiqur misses
Razzaq strikes this time, another innocuous straight delivery, Vermeulen plays outside the line this time, is struck on the pad in front of off, that's the end of his stay
gets well forward and defends his first delivery towards the off side
superb delivery that, drifting into the batsman, turns away from the batsman, sharp bounce as well, the batsman is beaten
Matsikenyeri ends the over by pushing the ball off his pads in the direction of mid-on
Dropped, shortish ball just outside off, the batsman gets on his toes and cuts it firmly to cover point, Naeem Islam fluffs a chance low to his left
slanting into middle and leg, helped behind square leg for a single
length ball on middle, blocked back towards the bowler
on middle and off, opens the face to steer the ball towards backward point
cracking shot, the first boundary of the day for Zimbabwe, length ball just a bit of width, Waller gets a good stride in and threads it through cover for four, well-timed shot
finishes the over with a bouncer, Waller sways out of the way
on middle and leg, defended back to the bowler
outside off, the batsman watches it through to the keeper
spins away from the batsman after pitching outside off, easy leave for the batsman as that was quite short
shuffles across and turns the ball from offstump towards midwicket
slightly overpitched outside off, driven firmly towards mid-off off the front foot
better line from Razzak to end the over, pitching on middle and off and turning away, batsman keeps bat and pad together as he defends
Nazmul starts the ninth over with a length ball angling into off, the batsman's reply to that is a forward defensive
similar delivery, gets on the front foot and pushes it towards mid-off
no footwork there as Matsikenyeri looks to crack the ball through covers, he's beaten outside off
big appeal for lbw from the bowler, an inside-edge saves the batsman, that would have crashed into legstump
fired into offstump, the batsman cautiously defends it off the front foot
keeps bat and pad together as he blocks it towards the off side, that's a maiden
pitching on legstump, worked away towards square leg
and again, the ball is tucked off the pads towards square leg
turns sharply this time, defends with the outer half of the bat towards the off side
looks to drive this one past the bowler, gets an inside edge towards midwicket
turn and bounce again, Matsikenyeri is looking to sweep that one, not the smartest choice of shot as that was spinning away after bouncing outside off, can't get bat on it
gets a single this time, clips the ball to square leg
length ball on middle and leg, defended to the leg side
again midwicket does the fielding, the ball was slanting into leg, the batsman taps it to midwicket
length ball on middle and leg, defended again by the batsman
length ball, the batsman comes down the track and punches the ball towards mid-off, sets off immediately for the single
that one kept low, pitching just short of length outside off, pushed towards extra cover
end of another quiet over, Waller pushes the ball towards extra cover again
length ball on middle, swept behind square leg
a touch short, and a bit of width, Matsikenyeri stands tall and slashes that behind backward point
down the leg side
full ball on middle and leg, worked towards square leg
a lot of turn but that ball pitched too far outside off to interest the batsman
another boundary, much too short, sat up to be hit, Waller swivels as he swipes that past midwicket
'Wait in, wait in' is the call after Waller pokes the ball towards cover, the fielder stops the ball by moving quickly to his left
gets foward and defends to the off side
comes down the track and lofts the ball just over the man at short cover
Waller plays inside the line of the ball, it turns across his bat and he is beaten
pitched outside off, turned away, left alone
outside off again, but closer to the stump, gets forward and blocks it
on the pads this time, the batsman presents the full face of the bat as he defends it down the pitch
Enamul hasn't had a great start, fires it down the leg side
into middle and leg this time, inside-edged onto the batsman's boot
slightly short, looks to cut, gets it away towards cover

gets a wicket with a not too threatening delivery, short and turns away, should have been put away for a boundary, instead Matsikenyeri can only slap it to backward point, where the fielder takes a smart catch diving to his left
lunges forward as he looks to defend, gets a thick outside edge towards point
more confident shot this, pushed towards mid-off
spins away after pitching on off, the batsman initially looked to cut but pulled out of the stroke
fired in flat, into middle stump, punched back to the bowler
sharp turn for Shakib, left alone by the batsman
full delivery this one, the batsman nearly yorked himself as he defended that
again plenty of turn, but bounces too far outside off to trouble the batsman
full and outside off, defended with a flat bat towards point
that's another maiden, Waller defends the final delivery towards mid-off
slightly short., the batsman gets behind the line and defends back down the pitch
short ball, the batsman was looking to smack it over midwicket, it was too quick for him though, going on with the arm, and he is hit on the pads outside the line of leg
arm ball does the job, Zimbabwe slip further into the abyss, the batsman was looking for the turn as he defended, this one didn't spin and sneaked through the big gap between bat and pad
length ball, defended towards the off side off the front foot
great ball that, turn and bounce, the batsman drops his wrists to keeps the bat low and leave the ball
fired in quicker, into the pads, worked away towards midwicket
bowling from wide of the crease, on off, defended back towards the bowler
on the pads this time, glanced towards short fine leg for a single
full ball on middle and off, the batsman gets a big stride in as he blocks it back to the bowler

sensational catch by Nazmul, that's the seventh wicket down, length ball outside off, the batsman drives it towards cover point where Nazmul throws himself full length to his right and takes a blinder, he was parallel to the ground as he took that one
defended outside the off stump
fuller length delivery, driven off the front-foot to extra cover, no room for a single there
flat delivery on the stumps, Chigumbura looks to drive, ball clips the inside edge and rolls away towards short cover
drifting down the leg side, Chigumbura gets hit on the pad - appeal for lbw turned down
quicker delivery, Chigumbura is once again hit on the pad - another appeal turned down. Again missing leg I guess
bit wide outside the off stump, forced away off the back-foot to the cover region
slightly shot, Chigumbura stays back and defends it down on the leg side

oh dear! tossed up and on the stumps, Chigumbura pushes forward and drives it in the air and back towards the bowler, Enamul Haque moves across to his left, dives low and takes a superb catch. Zimbabwe 8 down - just two more to go
arm ball, defended watchfully
coming in with the angle - Cremer pushes forward to defend and gets hit on the pad. Appeal turned down
defended getting well forward
driven off the front-foot to deep cover, they have now passed the lowest score in ODIs.
comes well forward and taps it away to cover

nine down! fuller length delivery, fired in bit quicker this time, Price pushes forward to defend but fails to get bat on ball and the ball crashes into his toe. The angle would have take the ball towards the stumps. Not much appeal there but umpire Nadir Sha is convinced.
pushed wide of the fielder at cover, easy single
defended outside the off stump
comes well forward and pushes the ball back to the bowler
quicker delivery and Jarvis is hit on the pad, loud appeal for lbw turned down.
pitched close to the off stump line and turning away, Jarvis drives down the wrong line and the ball zips past the outside the edge. Close call
short in length, Jarvis gets well forward and defends it down watchfully, well played
fuller length delivery, defended down on the leg side
pitched wide outside the off stump and turning away, no shot offered
fires this in with the angle, Cremer is beaten for pace and the ball thuds into the pad, would have missed leg
fuller length delivery outside the off stump and Cremer drives it away straight to the fielder at cover
defended pushing well forward, ball clips the outside edge and pops up on the off side but falls short of the fielder at silly point
down the leg side
pitched up in the slot outside the off stump and Cremer drives hard - a well timed shot but the ball goes straight to the man at cover
straight delivery outside the off stump, no shot offered
pitched wide and turning away, Jarvis pushes at it and gets beaten by a long way
defended outside the off stump
pitched up outside the off stump, driven hard but straight to the fielder at cover
driven on the up and the ball rolls away of the outside edge
tossed up and turning away, Jarvis is sucked forward in to the drive and is beaten all ends up
arm ball, Cremer looks to defended and is beaten
another arm ball and Cremer gets hit on the pad, impact was outside the line of the off stump
short ball, cut away on the bounce to the fielder at point
slightly shot, Cremer comes forward and pushes it down to mid-off
driven stretching well forward, gets it just wide of the fielder at extra cover and they scamper through for a single
quicker delivery outside the off stump and Jarvis is beaten
on the middle and leg stump line, Cremer stays back and taps it away on the leg side
quicker delivery, drifting down on the leg side and Creamer gets hit on the pad
full and on the stumps, driven straight back down the track
slightly short and on the pads, Cremer goes back and across and works it away behind square on the leg side
flat delivery outside the off stump, Jarvis gets a good stride in and defends it with a straight bat
again pushed away off the front-foot to the cover region. Another over goes by without a wicket - what a surprise!
wide delivery outside the off stump, Cremer shapes up to cut but fails to make contact
driven off the back-foot and Cremer gets it wide of the fielder at cover
flat and coming in with the angle, defended stretching well forward
again defended off the front-foot

that's the end of that! tossed up on the middle and off stump line, Jarvis get forward and pushes it straight back to the bowler. Shakib holds on to an easy chance and Zimbabwe are all out for 44 in 24.5 overs

inn2.comm: starts off with a wide delivery down the leg side - 44 more to get
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump, Tamim stands tall and defends it down on the off side
short ball, Tamim has a swing at it but fails to make contact and it's called a no-ball by umpire Dar. Free hit coming up
good length delivery outside the off stump, Tamim gets forward and hammers it in the air and through extra cover for a boundary
good length delivery, driven away straight to the fielder at cover
bowled from round the stumps and pitched wide outside the off stump, Tamim dances down the track and has a go at it, ball clips the outside edge and races away to the third man fence.
short delivery outside the off stump, Tamim gets his front-foot out of the way and drives it away towards cover
driven wide of the fielder at mid-off and they scamper through for a single
good length delivery outside the off stump, defended
good length and coming in with the angle, Tamim gets forward and pushes it away on the leg side. Not a well timed shot and the ball went straight to the fielder at short midwicket
short delivery, bowled from round the stumps and coming in with the angle. Tamim shapes to pull but changes his mind at the last moment and defends it down watchfully
worked away through square leg for an easy single
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump, defended towards point
slower delivery, Siddique picks it up early - stays back and taps it away towards point
short and wide outside the off stump - bowled from round the wicket. Tamim stays back and cuts it away well in front of point
short delivery, Tamim leans back and pulls it away through midwicket.  Not a well timed shot
short and wide outside the off stump, Siddique waits for it on the back-foot and at the last moment cuts it away to third man, fumble in the deep by Coventry allows the ball to touch the ropes.
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump, defended down watchfully
another no-ball and another free hit coming up! good length delivery outside the off stump, Siddique drives it away towards cover
short ball, Siddique comes down the track and pulls it away to deep midwicket - not a well timed shot though and the fielder in the deep cuts it off
short of a good length delivery, coming in with the angle - Siddique stays back and defends it down on the off side
tossed up and turning away, Tamim looks to sweep but fails to make contact
close but not close enough! tossed up outside the off stump, Tamim gets a good stride in and drives it in the air and just over the fielder at cover. Half a chance there
defended outside the off stump
pitched close to the off stump line and turning away, Tamim leaves it through to the keeper
pitched on middle and leg and turning across, Tamim stays back and works it away behind square on the leg side
bit of width offered, Tamim looks to cut but the shot is not timed well enough and the ball rolls away off the bottom half of the bat
flat delivery outside the off stump, defended stretching well forward
forced away towards point, Siddique goes right back and defends it with a straight bat
slightly short and close to the off stump line,
similar line and length from Price - Siddique defends it down watchfully
gets well forward and pushes it away on the off side
steps forward and drives it straight back down the track, Price moves across to his left and cuts it off
pitched outside the off stump and turning away - no shot offered
flat delivery outside the off stump, Tamim goes low and sweeps it away behind square on the leg side, the first run is taken quickly and they comfortably comes back for the second. Well run
driven away through the gap between the cover fielders
this one kept low and turned in - Siddique somehow manages to get bat on ball and then steals a single down to short third man. Well played in the end
defended outside the off stump
short delivery, Tamim stands tall on the back-foot and punches it down to mid-on. The fielder is at the edge of the circle and they scamper through for the single
turned away through midwicket, easy single
punched off the back-foot and down long-on for a single

flat delivery on the middle and off stump line, Tamim goes low and sweep but fails to keep it down. Cremer at square leg drives across to his right and takes a low catch. Umpire Aleem Dar has a word with the fielder before he gives the nod
full and drifting down the leg side, defended with a straight bat
pitched close to the off stump line and turning away, Ashraful is sucked forward and the ball zips past the outside edge
the one that goes straight on with the arm - Ashraful is clueless and the ball thuds in to the pad. Loud appeal and up goes the finger. Ashraful departs for a duck.
slow delivery down the leg side, Siddique goes back and works it away to square leg
way down the leg side, a poor delivery and the ball goes past the keeper
full and on the stumps, Siddique stretches well forward and defends it with a straight bat
defended off the back-foot
goodness me! wide delivery outside the off stump, Siddique stretches across and needlessly pushes at it, ball clips the outside edge and goes straight to Vermeulen at first slip.
quicker delivery outside the off stump, no shot offered
on the middle and leg stump line, Naeem Islam is cramped for room but he manages to pushes it back down the track.
drifting down the leg side, Raqibul fails to get a touch on it but the ball clips the pad and runs down fine. 7 more to get
defended with a straight bat
edged away behind square on the off side
fuller length delivery, driven away towards cover
quicker delivery, pitched close to the off stump line and this one turned late - Raqibul pushes forward to defend and is beaten comprehensively
on the pads, defended down on the leg side. End of a fine over

Naeem departs! tossed up on the middle and leg stump line, the one that goes straight on - Naeem goes for the slog sweep and the finds the lone fielder in the deep on the leg side. That was a horrible shot to say the least - Bangladesh four down but they need just 7 more to win this one.
turned away off the pads to the short fine leg reigon
beaten outside the off stump, again big turn there
worked away on the leg side, diving stop at short midwicket cuts off the single
fuller length delivery outside the off stump, Rahim picks up the length quickly and drives through the line and gets it into the gap between mid-off and cover. Welcome runs for Bangladesh
wide delivery outside the off stump, no shot offered
short delivery, Raqibul looks to work it away fine but the shot is not time well enough
nudged away behind square on the leg side, no room for a single there
defended on the front-foot
pitched up outside the off stump and Raqibul drives it past the fielder at cover, two more added to the total
flat delivery, pitched close to the off stump line and turning away late, Raqibul pushes forward to defend and is beaten
turned away off the pads to the midwicket region, easy single
flat and full - driven back to the bowler.
on the middle and off stump line, hint of turn there -  Raqibul gets right behind the line and defends it with a straight bat
looks to work this one away on the leg side but fails to make contact and the ball rolls away off the pad. Half a shout for lbw turned down
defended off the back-foot
all over! tossed up on the leg stump line, Raqibul gets his front leg out of the way and slogs it over the wide long-on fence.
